tasks.title: Implement user authentication service
tasks.description: Create a secure authentication service that handles user login, registration, and password reset using JWT tokens.

tasks.title: Develop data visualization dashboard
tasks.description: Create an interactive dashboard that visualizes user engagement metrics and system performance data using React and D3.js.

tasks.title: Optimize database queries for user search
tasks.description: Refactor existing database queries to improve performance of the user search functionality. Current search takes >3s, target is <500ms.

tasks.title: Implement automated CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Set up automated testing and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions to ensure code quality and streamline deployment.

tasks.title: Create RESTful API for content management
tasks.description: Design and implement a RESTful API for managing blog posts, media content, and user-generated content. API should follow OpenAPI standards.
